Title: Middle Ground
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), David Shore, David Renaud (executive story editor), Karen Struck (executive story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (story editor), Mark Rozeman (staff writer), Brian Shin (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Tamlyn Tomita
Plot: As Shaun pushes back against Dr. Melendez in order to treat a gravely ill hospital janitor and deal with the return of Lea, Dr. Lim risks a lawsuit and her career to help a teenage girl ...
